Josh Evans (film producer) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Josh_Evans_(film_producer) 0 Joshua C. Evans (born January 16, 1971) is an American filmmaker, screenwriter, author and actor best known for his role in Born on the Fourth of July (1989). Joshua_C._Evans ( born January_16 , 1971 ) is an_American_filmmaker , screenwriter , author_and_actor best_known for his_role in Born on the_Fourth of July ( 1989 ) .
